careers.title: Frontend Developer
careers.description: Build responsive web applications using React, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

careers.title: Backend Developer
careers.description: Develop REST APIs and manage server-side logic using Node.js and Express.

careers.title: UI/UX Designer
careers.description: Create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces for web and mobile apps.

careers.title: Product Manager
careers.description: Oversee product development from concept to launch and coordinate with cross-functional teams.

careers.title: QA Engineer
careers.description: Perform automated and manual testing to ensure software quality and reliability.

careers.title: DevOps Engineer
careers.description: Maintain CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and deployment processes.

careers.title: Marketing Specialist
careers.description: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns to drive engagement and growth.

careers.title: Data Analyst
careers.description: Analyze datasets to provide actionable insights for business decisions.

careers.title: Customer Support Representative
careers.description: Assist customers with inquiries, issues, and provide excellent service.

careers.title: Full Stack Developer
careers.description: Work on both frontend and backend, building end-to-end web applications.
